item.title: National Park Whitewater Rafting in New River Gorge WV
item.description: Experience a thrilling West Virginia adventure without compromising on safety during this six-hour whitewater rafting trip in New River Gorge National Park, which includes hands-on attention from a rafting guide. Enjoy amazing scenery while challenging Class III and IV rapids, with a catered lunch stop at the halfway point. Travelers with limited time can opt for the express option offered in the afternoon.

image.alt: National Park Whitewater Rafting in New River Gorge WV

item.title: Lower New River Whitewater Rafting Trip
item.description: Navigate a mix of whitewater rapids and lazy stretches of river during this half-day guided rafting experience in West Virginia. Work as a team to maintain balance and steer. Listen to stories about the area’s natural scenery and coal mining towns. A boxed picnic lunch by the river is included, plus free time to swim, float, or jump off rocks.

image.alt: Lower New River Whitewater Rafting Trip

item.title: New River Gorge ATV Adventure Tour
item.description: Experience the great outdoors atop an all-terrain vehicle (ATV) during this small-group adventure near Fayetteville. After a brief safety orientation, venture out onto the wild and rugged terrain of West Virginia to explore New River Gorge. Traverse muddy trails, stop to admire the landscapes, and even see some local wildlife along the way.

image.alt: New River Gorge ATV Adventure Tour

item.title: New River Gorge Side by Side Family Tour
item.description: West Virginia’s New River Gorge National Park and Preserve is a huge park that can be easy to get lost in if you adventure in alone. Instead, book this New River Gorge National Park and Preserve UTV Tour from Minden and go with a guide and others on some of the park’s most muddy terrain on a UTV.

image.alt: New River Gorge Side by Side Family Tour

item.title: Gravity New River Gorge Zip Lines
item.description: West Virginia is famous for its outdoor activities and this zipline adventure in Fayetteville is no exception. Join a small group and gear up for an adrenaline-pumping experience across the ridgeline of a mountain bowl. Soar above the New River Gorge on a series of ziplines at heights of up to 200 feet (61 meters).

image.alt: Gravity New River Gorge Zip Lines

item.title: Lower Gauley River Whitewater Rafting Trip
item.description: Huge waves, large holes, and drops that’ll seem almost unrunnable by raft: this whitewater rafting tour through West Virginia’s Lower Gauley River is full of rapids rated from Class I through Class V. Prepare to tackle Class III rapids throughout the trip, knowing that your professional guide and crew members will help you stay afloat. Lunch, drinks, safety gear, and paddles are all provided.

image.alt: Lower Gauley River Whitewater Rafting Trip

item.title: New River Gorge Zip Line Canopy Tour
item.description: Take a half-day zipline tour that provides a close view of the hemlock forest of West Virginia’s New River Gorge. Your guide prepares you with the needed equipment and instruction, then takes you to a course with seven ziplines, along with platforms and bridges. Glide over the forest and across Mill Creek on an active tour that is suitable for people with a moderate level of fitness.

image.alt: New River Gorge Zip Line Canopy Tour

item.title: Half Day New River Gorge Whitewater Rafting
item.description:
There is no adventure like whitewater rafting and there is no river trip like a Lower New River Gorge whitewater rafting trip. Rafting the New through the New River Gorge National Park is a milestone for East Coast paddlers.
The New River Gorge is the second oldest river in the world. Coursing through a 1000' deep canyon that is lined with soaring sandstone cliffs it is no surprise that this area was recently designated as a National Park. Wildlife sightings are abundant and guests will finish their river trip beneath the famous single arch expansion bridge known as the New River Gorge Bridge.

image.alt: Half Day New River Gorge Whitewater Rafting

item.title: New River Gorge Whitewater Rafting, WV - Lower New Full Day
item.description: The New River Gorge is the second oldest river in the world. Coursing through a 1000' deep canyon that is lined with soaring sandstone cliffs it is no surprise that this area was recently designated as a National Park. Wildlife sightings are abundant and guests will finish their river trip beneath the famous single arch expansion bridge known as the New River Gorge Bridge.

image.alt: New River Gorge Whitewater Rafting, WV - Lower New Full Day

item.title: New River Gorge National Park Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description:
Discover the heart of Appalachia with this self-guided tour of the stunning New River Gorge National Park! Check out the world-famous, record-smashing New River Gorge Bridge. Learn about the West Virginia mine wars. And get to know a few of the park’s most iconic critters, from the hellbender to the black bear! Each stop provides gorgeous views, unforgettable experiences, and narratives that will have you on the edge of your seat!
Purchase one tour per car, not per person. Everyone listens together!
After booking, check your email to download the separate Audio Tour Guide App by Action, enter your unique password, and access your tour. These steps require good internet/Wi-Fi access. From there, follow the audio instructions and the route.
New, extra validity — now yours for an entire year! Use multiple times over multiple trips!

image.alt: New River Gorge National Park Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.title: New River Gorge Jeep Tour (Half Day)
item.description: Leave the pavement behind and explore America’s newest National Park by Jeep! In the heart of the Appalachian Mountains, the New River Gorge National Park and Preserve is home to a rich coal mining history, unique heritage, folklore, and off-the-beaten-path views you’ll never forget. Our first and only-of-its-kind Jeep tours combines these things to immerse the whole family in history, nature, and adventure.

image.alt: New River Gorge Jeep Tour (Half Day)

item.title: New River Gorge, WV - Zip Line Tour
item.description: This is the only zipline tour with scenic views of the New River. You’ll even get to enjoy the scenic beauty of the New River Gorge from observation platforms along the way. This unique experience includes 9 zips, each different from the last, and 2 sky bridges.

image.alt: New River Gorge, WV - Zip Line Tour

item.title: New River Gorge National Park Audio Tour Guide
item.description:
Welcome to the adventure playground that is New River Gorge National Park! I'm your audio guide, ready to lead you through nature's rollercoaster ride.
Marvel at the jaw-dropping canyon views, carved by the legendary New River – it's like nature showing off its sculpting skills. Get your heart pumping with thrilling whitewater rafting and rock climbing – we're all about turning adrenaline into memories here.
And hey, keep your eyes peeled for our forest friends – they're the real VIPs of this wilderness party. So buckle up, folks! It's time for an adventure like no other at New River Gorge National Park!
*Download the app to access your purchased tours.*

image.alt: New River Gorge National Park Audio Tour Guide

item.title: Guided Ghost Walking Tour Through Historic Fayetteville
item.description: As the sun sets, join your ghostly guide, who will be in full phantom garb, for an evening of folklore, ghost stories, and tales of suspicious disappearances! Meet at the local visitor’s center to begin your haunted adventure—with six stops at haunted theaters, houses, and public buildings you’re sure to leave rattled. Two bonus nearby haunts and otherworldly happenings will also be introduced. Learn about the history of the region while delving into some traditional Appalachian ghost stories and folklore.

image.alt: Guided Ghost Walking Tour Through Historic Fayetteville

item.title: 30+ National Parks Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle
item.description: Explore more than 20 national parks, monuments, and forests across the country, including the Grand Canyon, Joshua Tree, and Acadia, with this self-guided driving tour bundle. Enjoy the flexibility to travel at your own pace, with hands-free functionality, and offline access, so you can use it even in remote areas. Includes full itineraries, travel tips, audio guide, videos, and text.

image.alt: 30+ National Parks Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle

item.title: Art and Architecture in the Downtown Charleston: A Self-Guided Audio Tour
item.description:
See quirky public art and diverse architecture on this self-guided walking tour of Downtown Charleston Historic District.
• Find Charleston’s smallest piece of public art and stroll down the first brick-paved street in the United States • Hear from producer Emma Carpenter whose passion for historic buildings and architecture lead her to create this VoiceMap tour while she was still in high school • Do it all in 45 minutes or linger at stops along the way with complete control over when you start and finish • Get unlimited use before your booking date and after it • Use the virtual tour option at home
Once you’ve booked, you’ll receive a ticket with instructions and a unique code listed under “Before You Go”. Then simply install the VoiceMap app and enter your code.
The app displays directions to the starting point, and when you’re in the right place, just pop in your headphones and tap start. VoiceMap has automatic GPS playback, with turn-by-turn directions. It also works offline.

image.alt: Art and Architecture in the Downtown Charleston: A Self-Guided Audio Tour

item.title: New River Gorge, WV Adventure Waterpark - Full Day
item.description:
This 5 acre spring fed lake has been transformed into a floating adventure playground! The morning session gives you unlimited access from 9 AM to 8 PM. This waterpark experience includes two 40' tall Wet Willie waterslides, two tower zip lines, 50 huge inflatable toys, a 25' climbing mountain, giant spinning Saturn balls, and a floating obstacle course.
Waterpark passes also include complimentary access to hiking and biking trails throughout our 1500 acre resort in the New River Gorge area of West Virginia.

image.alt: New River Gorge, WV Adventure Waterpark - Full Day

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: West Virginia’s Cultural Crown!
item.description: Trade the busy tour groups for a self-guided adventure with this app-led scavenger hunt through Charleston. Explore landmarks and hidden gems, solve challenges, and answer trivia questions to get acquainted with the southern city. Ideal for team-building, bachelorette parties, or birthdays, this interactive experience offers the opportunity to compete or collaborate as you discover new facts and places.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: West Virginia’s Cultural Crown!

item.title: Ace Adventure Water Park Admission Ticket
item.description:
This 5 acre spring fed lake has been transformed into a floating adventure playground! The morning session gives you unlimited access from 9 AM to 3 PM. This waterpark experience includes two 40' tall Wet Willie waterslides, two tower zip lines, 50 huge inflatable toys, a 25' climbing mountain, giant spinning Saturn balls, and a floating obstacle course.
Waterpark passes also include complimentary access to hiking and biking trails throughout our 1500 acre resort in the New River Gorge area of West Virginia.

image.alt: Ace Adventure Water Park Admission Ticket

item.title: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Charleston WV
item.description:
Step into the shoes of a newly-minted detective, tasked by Commander Mahoney to solve a gripping case, murder on the streets of Charleston.
Throughout this crime-solving audio adventure, visit each of the 10 mapped locations. You'll have the option to explore the downtown area using the Walking Map or follow a Driving Map on the city's outskirts. Once you choose, the exact starting point will be revealed. *See images for route
Park or stop at each location, listen to the audio story, and put your detective skills to the test by gathering clues and piecing together the evidence. Finally, make your deductions and issue an arrest warrant.
Your overall detective skills will be evaluated, culminating in a Case Performance Score to measure your sleuthing prowess. This game is suitable for solo detectives, dynamic duos, or groups of mystery enthusiasts, offering an immersive audio tale filled with intrigue.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Charleston WV

item.title: New River Gorge, WV Adventure Waterpark- 3 PM to 8PM
item.description:
This 5 acre spring fed lake has been transformed into a floating adventure playground! The morning session gives you unlimited access from 3 PM to 8 PM. This waterpark experience includes two 40' tall Wet Willie waterslides, two tower zip lines, 50 huge inflatable toys, a 25' climbing mountain, giant spinning Saturn balls, and a floating obstacle course.
Waterpark passes also include complimentary access to hiking and biking trails throughout our 1500 acre resort in the New River Gorge area of West Virginia.

image.alt: New River Gorge, WV Adventure Waterpark- 3 PM to 8PM

item.title: Professional ATV Photoshoot Near Hatfield McCoy Trails
item.description: Don't just ride the trail—own it, remember it, and share it with the world through captivating images that encapsulate the essence of your off-road triumph. Book now and let your story unfold in every shot.

image.alt: Professional ATV Photoshoot Near Hatfield McCoy Trails

item.title: Private Tour National Park Whitewater Rafting in New River Gorge
item.description:
Experience our Private Excursion tailored exclusively for you!
Embark on a serene journey through the picturesque landscapes of USA as you make your way to the heart of the city. Upon your arrival, meet your seasoned tour guide, ready to lead you on an enchanting tour of National Park Whitewater Rafting in New River Gorge.
Discover the awe-inspiring allure of National Park Whitewater in New River Gorge, marvel at the grandeur of Rafting, and capture iconic moments, and many more.
Leave the details to us as we escort you on an extraordinary adventure, crafting memories that will stand the test of time!

image.alt: Private Tour National Park Whitewater Rafting in New River Gorge

item.title: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Charleston WV by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Charleston, West Virginia, might seem like an easy-going place for a quiet stroll, but this scavenger hunt will have you seeing its streets in a different light. A variation of standard scavenger hunts, this game takes place during a zombie apocalypse. You and your team will scour Charleston trying to find survival items and earn points.

image.alt: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Charleston WV by Zombie Scavengers
